## Introduction

This week will introduce analysis workflow of supervised learning.

## Learning Objectives

By the end of this week, you will be able to:

1. Understand different analysis workflow of supervised learning.
2. Understand train-test split and train-validation-test split.
3. Understand cross validation and its extensions as well as when to use them.
